General.Name: ECS Botanics Holdings Ltd
General.Description: ECS Botanics Holdings Ltd engages in the cultivation, manufacture, and sale of medicinal cannabis products. It also retails hemp wellness and food products; and engages in the agriculture business. The company is based in Murrabit, Australia.
General.Address: 94 Green Rises Road, Launceston, TAS, Australia, 7302
